description: Returns a list of connector-profile details matching the provided connector-profile names and connector-types. Both input lists are optional, and you can use them to filter the result. If no names or connector-types are provided, returns all connector profiles in a paginated form. If there is no match, this operation returns an empty list.

parameters.name: connectorProfileNames
parameters.description: The name of the connector profile. The name is unique for each ConnectorProfile in the Amazon Web Services account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: connectorProfileDetails
nested_items.description: Returns information about the connector profiles associated with the flow.

nested_items.name: connectorProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector profile.

nested_items.name: connectorProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the connector profile. The name is unique for each ConnectorProfile in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: connectorType
nested_items.description: The type of connector, such as Salesforce, Amplitude, and so on.

nested_items.name: connectorLabel
nested_items.description: The label for the connector profile being created.

nested_items.name: connectionMode
nested_items.description: Indicates the connection mode and if it is public or private.

nested_items.name: credentialsArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector profile credentials.

nested_items.name: connectorProfileProperties
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties of the profile configuration.

nested_items.name: Amplitude
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Amplitude.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Datadog resource.

nested_items.name: Dynatrace
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Dynatrace.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Dynatrace resource.

nested_items.name: GoogleAnalytics
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required Google Analytics.

nested_items.name: Honeycode
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Amazon Honeycode.

nested_items.name: InforNexus
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Infor Nexus.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Infor Nexus resource.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Marketo resource.

nested_items.name: databaseUrl
nested_items.description: The JDBC URL of the Amazon Redshift cluster.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: A name for the associated Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: bucketPrefix
nested_items.description: The object key for the destination bucket in which Amazon AppFlow places the files.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of IAM role that grants Amazon Redshift read-only access to Amazon S3. For more information, and for the polices that you attach to this role, see Allow Amazon Redshift to access your Amazon AppFlow data in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: dataApiRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that permits Amazon AppFlow to access your Amazon Redshift database through the Data API. For more information, and for the polices that you attach to this role, see Allow Amazon AppFlow to access Amazon Redshift databases with the Data API.

nested_items.name: isRedshiftServerless
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the connector profile defines a connection to an Amazon Redshift Serverless data warehouse.

nested_items.name: clusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique ID that's assigned to an Amazon Redshift cluster.

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon Redshift workgroup.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon Redshift database.

nested_items.name: Salesforce
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Salesforce.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Salesforce resource.

nested_items.name: isSandboxEnvironment
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the connector profile applies to a sandbox or production environment.

nested_items.name: usePrivateLinkForMetadataAndAuthorization
nested_items.description: If the connection mode for the connector profile is private, this parameter sets whether Amazon AppFlow uses the private network to send metadata and authorization calls to Salesforce. Amazon AppFlow sends private calls through Amazon Web Services PrivateLink. These calls travel through Amazon Web Services infrastructure without being exposed to the public internet.
Calls to get metadata about your Salesforce records. This metadata describes your Salesforce objects and their fields.
Calls to get or refresh access tokens that allow Amazon AppFlow to access your Salesforce records.
Calls to transfer your Salesforce records as part of a flow run.

nested_items.name: ServiceNow
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by serviceNow.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the ServiceNow resource.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Slack resource.

nested_items.name: Snowflake
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Snowflake.

nested_items.name: warehouse
nested_items.description: The name of the Snowflake warehouse.

nested_items.name: stage
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 stage that was created while setting up an Amazon S3 stage in the Snowflake account. This is written in the following format: < Database>< Schema><Stage Name>.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket associated with Snowflake.

nested_items.name: bucketPrefix
nested_items.description: The bucket path that refers to the Amazon S3 bucket associated with Snowflake.

nested_items.name: privateLinkServiceName
nested_items.description: The Snowflake Private Link service name to be used for private data transfers.

nested_items.name: accountName
nested_items.description: The name of the account.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the Snowflake account.

nested_items.name: Trendmicro
nested_items.description: The connector-specific properties required by Trend Micro.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Veeva resource.

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Zendesk resource.

nested_items.name: applicationHostUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the SAPOData resource.

nested_items.name: applicationServicePath
nested_items.description: The application path to catalog service.

nested_items.name: portNumber
nested_items.description: The port number of the SAPOData instance.

nested_items.name: clientNumber
nested_items.description: The client number for the client creating the connection.

nested_items.name: logonLanguage
nested_items.description: The logon language of SAPOData instance.

nested_items.name: privateLinkServiceName
nested_items.description: The SAPOData Private Link service name to be used for private data transfers.

nested_items.name: oAuthProperties
nested_items.description: The SAPOData OAuth properties required for OAuth type authentication.

nested_items.name: tokenUrl
nested_items.description: The token url required to fetch access/refresh tokens using authorization code and also to refresh expired access token using refresh token.

nested_items.name: authCodeUrl
nested_items.description: The authorization code url required to redirect to SAP Login Page to fetch authorization code for OAuth type authentication.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The OAuth scopes required for OAuth type authentication.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: disableSSO
nested_items.description: If you set this parameter to true, Amazon AppFlow bypasses the single sign-on (SSO) settings in your SAP account when it accesses your SAP OData instance.

nested_items.name: CustomConnector
nested_items.description: The properties required by the custom connector.

nested_items.name: profileProperties
nested_items.description: A map of properties that are required to create a profile for the custom connector.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: oAuth2Properties
nested_items.description: The OAuth 2.0 properties required for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: tokenUrl
nested_items.description: The token URL required for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: oAuth2GrantType
nested_items.description: The OAuth 2.0 grant type used by connector for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: tokenUrlCustomProperties
nested_items.description: Associates your token URL with a map of properties that you define. Use this parameter to provide any additional details that the connector requires to authenticate your request.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: instanceUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the Salesforce Pardot resource.

nested_items.name: isSandboxEnvironment
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the connector profile applies to a sandbox or production environment.

nested_items.name: businessUnitId
nested_items.description: The business unit id of Salesforce Pardot instance.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Specifies when the connector profile was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Specifies when the connector profile was last updated.

nested_items.name: privateConnectionProvisioningState
nested_items.description: Specifies the private connection provisioning state.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Specifies the private connection provisioning status.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: Specifies the private connection provisioning failure reason.

nested_items.name: failureCause
nested_items.description: Specifies the private connection provisioning failure cause.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token for the next page of data. If nextToken=null, this means that all records have been fetched.
